name: Domain of Mastery: Thundering Valley
description:
Monsters have stormed this altar where violet sakura bloom eternal.
You shall earn Talent level-up materials, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Mastery: Thundering Valley I
disorder: All characters in the party gain a 25% Electro DMG Bonus.

Inside the challenge is Electro Crystalfruit, and Nascent Electro Pearls will emerge at intervals. After obtaining Nascent Electro Pearls, a character's Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst will unleash Falling Thunder upon hitting enemies, dealing Electro DMG.
